data.title: Budget Airline Football - A Fans Guide
data.meta_description: Publishing platform for digital magazines, interactive publications and online catalogs. Convert documents to beautiful publications and share them worldwide. Title: Budget Airline Football - A Fans Guide, Author: Stuartnoel, Length: 251 pages, Published: 2008-06-15
data.text:
A great guide from the publishers of the Fans Guide. THis book takes you through the details of over 30 destinations to watch football in Europe and includes how to get there, getting a ticket, what the stadium is like and what to avoid. Essential for any... More

A great guide from the publishers of the Fans Guide. THis book takes you through the details of over 30 destinations to watch football in Europe and includes how to get there, getting a ticket, what the stadium is like and what to avoid. Essential for any travelling fan in European football. Less
